title: Games APP ( IOS and Andriod )
desc: Similar to the very famous Fruit Ninja (chopping) game. Here is what I propose for the game:all kinds of garbage/wastes come down from top of the screen. They can be all kinds i.e.regular garbage (non-recyclable, bad food and those that can only be sent to landfills),solid waste (water bottle, cans, cardboard…), bad/abandoned food, electronic wastes (batteries, cell phones, computers)…The items can be cartoony or animated, and each item is worth certain points depending on it is recyclability and value.And recyclable phones will be the most valuable category. Players need to make their judgment quickly, and use theirfingers (or some other tools on high levels) to drag and drop different items to corresponding trash or recycle bins.As far as I understand we can have at least four kinds of bins. The bins can be at bottom or two sides of the screen.They can be still in first level and moving around to increase difficulty on higher levels…The accumulated points can be used to1.       Upto 3 levels now ( may be add more level later )2.       Purchase equipment in the game3.       Transfer to other friends/players (with certain limits)4.       Redeem real products in Shop for refurbished phones and accessories (with certain limits)Players should be able to share the app, their achievements and results on social media easily anytime.Players may also invite friends through social media to the game, and both inviting and invited parties will get extra points.Need Rough idea / game flow chart ( even handwriting ).No Additional paymentsWill consider BonusWill Provide API ( if need)Need Quick time around

title: Hire a Android, IOS Mobile VOIP dialer App Developer for A2Billing VOIP
desc: 1.	Creation of a dialer that will generate domestic and international calls that are completely free by utilizing the internet/proxy and have capability to connect to international land lines and mobile phone numbers with no special software or modifications on recipient end. Do not want it like skype where each person has to have skype app for call to be free. Calls completely free by using proxy.2.	Dialer can handle 1000 concurrent calls3.	Dialer has option of manually giving it a list of DID to display for caller ID or it will randomly assign DID and can advise it which area code/country to generate DID4.	Dialer will accept upload of numbers to dial in excel format with ability to mix phone numbers from different countries and dialer recognizing format and dialing multiple countries5.	Dialer will allow for attachment of a voice file to be played.6.	Dialer will generate real time statistics of how many calls were made, how many connections and how many fails7.	Dialer will allow for programming to decide how many rings before disconnect call8.	Dialer will also have a key pad so can manually input phone number to manually test connections and listen to connects9.	Dialer located on your server in the cloud with access simply from a username and password10.	Dialer will have a function where can program how long a connected call will last in minutes and seconds until hang up.11.	Can program dialer so that multiple calls will have multiple durations to multiple numbers. For example can program it so that as each connection happens it will be connected for a specified amount of minutes and seconds.12. Dialer can allow calling card - can automatically switch between calling card and internet connections through VOIP.

title: ANDROID APP TO MANAGE COMPLEX TASKS. NO BIDS FROM INDIAPAKISTAN
desc: CONCEPT: every task in life, such as 'eat sandwich' has multiple steps, such as 'buy bread, buy ham, buy lettuce, assemble sandwich, open mouth, close mouth.. :) The idea is an app that presents the user with one step at a time, so that a big complex task becomes simple and manageable.Here is the process: The user clicks a 'NEW TASK' button. NEW TASK SCREEN OPENS . Input boxes: task name , task objective. Then a button ADD FIRST STEP IN THE TASK to add task steps, with once a STEP is created, user can add NEXT STEP, and so on, as many steps as he wants , add a finish date and click SAVE.USER SCREEN has list of existing tasks.Each task will show 1) task name 2) task objective 3) finish date, 4) next step and DONE BUTTON 5) EDIT / DELETE buttonThe basic principle is that the app will display for each task, the NEXT STEP. Once a step is finished user can click the DONE button. Once DONE button is clicked he is now presented with the NEXT STEP from the entered steps. Once he is on the last step, he is presented with the FINISH TASK button.There will be a log button for each task that will take him to a text screen that shows when the task was created, which steps are finished and dates and times steps were finished , which steps remain etc etc.Users have to login /signup. Users get a 30 day free trial, and if they want to continue they have to sign up with a paypal subscription.Admin panel (on website) shows members,  type of membership, duration, dates payment was made etc. Admin can enter his paypal id here, change his admin password, change emails (welcome email, registration email , membership will expire soon email, premium membership email, membership has expired etc)EVERYTHING MUST BE 100% RESPONSIVE DESIGN, must look pleasing to the eye.ABSOLUTELY NO BIDS FROM INDIAPAKISTAN PLEASE. BUDGET 150

title: App Developer
desc: Good day to you reading this. I would like to know what it would cost to develop an app that has the following capabilities.  My name is Richard Hewett and I am part of a farming community in South Africa that are frequently attacked by hit squads of 3 or more armed hitmen. Violent murders in such cases are normal and sometimes complete families are wiped out. The app needs to be do the following.In case of an emergency and a panic button are pushed a lot of farmers will be alert to come and help.  It could be in the hundreds. When the "rescuers" receive the panic alert and they are in a position to help they must log into the app.  Each rescuer will have a username. As the persons log in they will appear on a gps screen on their phone. So will all the other [url removed, login to view] moving in to the problem area you can identify all the other rescuers on your smartphone as well. It will be easier to help block off roads if you know where all the others are. It will prevent crowding of an area. A ops room must also be able to direct certain rescuers to certain positions on the map. At the moment we use the cell411 app to activate the cells as a panic button. But we need some app to help streamline cordonning down an area.  Excuse my bad English but is not my maiden language. Anybody can help give us a figure on the cost of something like this? I do believe if we can get a proper app we can raise a significant amount of money for it.

title: Design a Smart Phone Application to Control Our Company's LED Lights via Wifi Network
desc: One of our factories has offered us a new style of LED stage light that can be controlled by wifi. We would like to design a branded application that people can download onto their phones (must be android and apple-compatible) that allows people to control the light(s).  The lights are designed to create a wifi network and then the user would connect to the wifi with their smart phone. We would need a solution that allows a single person/device to control multiple lights at the same time.You will communicate directly with our factory's engineers for technical questions and such.A potential mockup of the look/feel of the app is attached that shows the type of functionality we would need.Let us know if you have any questions. Thanks for your interest!-Andrew

title: Eye Gesture Controlled ball in IOS
desc: Hi, This is Kumar, i want to achieve a gesture controlled application in IOS which can track your eyes and responds accordingly, below is what i want to achieve in this application.1.	Initially the white ball resides in the middle of the screen.2.	User commands after the first screen.. When the user looks up with the eyes, the balls moves from center to the top of the screen and the new position of the ball is on the top of the screen.. When the user looks down with eyes, the ball moves to the bottom of the screen and the new position of the ball is on the bottom of the screen.. When the user looks right with eyes, the ball moves to the right of the screen and the new position of the ball is on the right of the screen.. When the user looks left with eyes, the ball moves to the left of the screen and the new position of the ball is on the left of the screen.3.	Basically, the ball has to move based on the eyes movement of the user (scanned using the camera).4.	Errors like rapid movement of the eyes and un intentional movement/wrong movement of the eyes should be ignored.5.	IOS only.
